attributes.action: Resignation of the PM Boris Johnson
attributes.additional_details: In order to prevail the supremacy of laws for the moral value embedded in UK laws as well as the UK laws when a person committed a crime, cannot stay in public office.
attributes.background: Take action as how a person who breach the covid rule can stay as PM

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
